mapper.select: SELECT R.REPLY_SQ , R.SCD_SQ , R.USER_ID , R.REPLY_TXT , R.INP_YMD , to_char(R.UPD_YMD,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as "UPD_YMD" , upper(U.USER_SEX) as USER_SEX FROM SM_REPLY_TB R, SM_USER_TB U where R.SCD_SQ = #{SCD_SQ} and R.USER_ID = U.USER_ID ORDER BY R.INP_YMD DESC , R.REPLY_SQ
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO SM_REPLY_TB ( REPLY_SQ , SCD_SQ , USER_ID , REPLY_TXT , INP_YMD , UPD_YMD ) VALUES ( SM_REPLY_TB_REPLY_SQ.nextval , #{SCD_SQ} , #{USER_ID} , #{REPLY_TXT} , sysdate , sysdate
)
